description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央银行，也是国务院组成部门。主要职责是拟订金融业改革和发展战略规划、制定和执行货币政策、汇率政策，承担最后贷款人的责任等。
description.en: The central bank of the People's Republic of China and a constituent department of the State Council. Its main responsibilities include drafting financial industry reform and development strategies, formulating and implementing monetary and exchange rate policies, and acting as the lender of last resort.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行的前身之一，中国人民银行以其为基础成立。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the People's Bank of China, which was established based on it.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行的前身之一，1948年与其他银行合并组建为中国人民银行。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the People's Bank of China, merged with other banks in 1948 to form the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行的前身之一，1948年与其他银行合并组建为中国人民银行。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the People's Bank of China, merged with other banks in 1948 to form the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河北省的省会，中国人民银行于1948年在此成立。
description.en: The capital of Hebei Province, People's Republic of China, where the People's Bank of China was established in 1948.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关，中国人民银行是其组成部门。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China, of which the People's Bank of China is a constituent department.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华苏维埃共和国国家银行

zh-cn: 中华苏维埃共和国国家银行

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党于1931年在中华苏维埃共和国成立，是中国人民银行的前身。
description.en: Established by the Communist Party of China in the Chinese Soviet Republic in 1931, it is the predecessor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的法定货币，由中国人民银行发行。
description.en: The legal tender of the People's Republic of China, issued by the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一项经济改革和社会开放政策，期间中国人民银行的职能发生了重大转变。
description.en: An economic reform and social opening policy in China, during which the functions of the People's Bank of China underwent significant changes.

en: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

description.zh-cn: 1984年成立，承办了原由中国人民银行承担的工商信贷和储蓄业务。
description.en: Established in 1984, it took over the industrial and commercial credit and savings business originally handled by the People's Bank of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中国人民银行法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中国人民银行法
en: Law of the People's Republic of China on the People's Bank of China

description.zh-cn: 以法律形式确立中国人民银行为中华人民共和国中央银行的法律文件。
description.en: A legal document that establishes the People's Bank of China as the central bank of the People's Republic of China in the form of national legislation.

nodes.id: 第八届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第八届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关，其第三次会议通过了《中华人民共和国中国人民银行法》。
description.en: The highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China, its third session passed the 'Law of the People's Republic of China on the People's Bank of China'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，1947年提议建立统一的中国人民银行。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China, who proposed the establishment of a unified People's Bank of China in 1947.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行首任行长。
description.en: The first Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: Former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾代理中国人民银行行长。
description.en: Former Acting Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: Former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: Former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: Former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: Former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: Former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任国务院副总理并兼任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: Former Vice Premier of the State Council who also served concurrently as Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: Former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: Former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: Former Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 现任中国人民银行行长、党委书记。
description.en: Current Governor and Party Committee Secretary of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行副行长，兼国家外汇管理局局长。
description.en: Deputy Governor of the People's Bank of China and Administrator of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行副行长。
description.en: Deputy Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行副行长。
description.en: Deputy Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行副行长。
description.en: Deputy Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行副行长。
description.en: Deputy Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中央纪委国家监委驻中国人民银行纪检监察组组长。
description.en: Head of the CCDI-NSC Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group stationed at the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的政治运动，期间中国人民银行与财政部合并。
description.en: A political movement in China, during which the People's Bank of China was merged with the Ministry of Finance.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国财政部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国财政部
en: Ministry of Finance of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国掌管国家财政的部门，在文革期间曾与中国人民银行合并。
description.en: The department of the People's Republic of China in charge of national finance, which was merged with the People's Bank of China during the Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 中国银行业监督管理委员会

zh-cn: 中国银行业监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 2003年成立，承接了中国人民银行对银行业的部分监管职能。后并入国家金融监督管理总局。
description.en: Established in 2003, it took over some of the regulatory functions of the People's Bank of China for the banking industry. It was later merged into the National Administration of Financial Regulation.

nodes.id: 国家金融监督管理总局

zh-cn: 国家金融监督管理总局

description.zh-cn: 2023年成立，承接了中国人民银行对金融控股公司等的日常监管职责和有关金融消费者保护职责。
description.en: Established in 2023, it took over the daily regulatory responsibilities for financial holding companies and other financial groups, as well as relevant financial consumer protection duties from the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 2023年国务院机构改革方案，涉及中国人民银行的职责调整和分支机构改革。
description.en: The 2023 State Council Institutional Reform Plan, which involved adjustments to the responsibilities and branch structure of the People's Bank of China.

nodes.id: 第十四届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关，其第一次会议批准了2023年《国务院机构改革方案》。
description.en: The highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China, its first session approved the 2023 'State Council Institutional Reform Plan'.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国人民银行党委书记、副行长。
description.en: Former Party Committee Secretary and Deputy Governor of the People's Bank of China.

nodes.id: 国务院金融稳定发展委员会

zh-cn: 国务院金融稳定发展委员会

description.zh-cn: 原办公室设在中国人民银行，2023年改革后不再保留，其职责划入中央金融委员会办公室。
description.en: Its office was formerly located within the People's Bank of China. It was dissolved after the 2023 reform, and its responsibilities were transferred to the Office of the Central Financial Commission.

nodes.id: 党和国家机构改革方案

zh-cn: 党和国家机构改革方案

description.zh-cn: 2023年中共中央印发的改革方案，规定不再保留国务院金融稳定发展委员会。
description.en: A reform plan issued by the CPC Central Committee in 2023, which stipulated the dissolution of the Financial Stability and Development Committee under the State Council.

nodes.id: 中央金融委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中央金融委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 承接了原国务院金融稳定发展委员会办公室的职责。
description.en: Took over the responsibilities of the former Office of the Financial Stability and Development Committee under the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 1948年12月1日，以华北银行为基础，合并北海银行和西北农民银行组建中国人民银行。
description.en: On December 1, 1948, the People's Bank of China was established based on the North China Bank, merging with the Beihai Bank and the Northwest Farmers Bank.

description.zh-cn: 1948年12月1日，北海银行与华北银行、西北农民银行合并组建中国人民银行。
description.en: On December 1, 1948, the Beihai Bank merged with the North China Bank and the Northwest Farmers Bank to form the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 1948年12月1日，西北农民银行与华北银行、北海银行合并组建中国人民银行。
description.en: On December 1, 1948, the Northwest Farmers Bank merged with the North China Bank and the Beihai Bank to form the People's Bank of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行是中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门。
description.en: The People's Bank of China is a constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华苏维埃共和国国家银行

description.zh-cn: 1931年11月，中国共产党在中华苏维埃共和国成立了中华苏维埃共和国国家银行。
description.en: In November 1931, the Communist Party of China established the National Bank of the Chinese Soviet Republic in the Chinese Soviet Republic.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行自成立起开始发行人民币作为国家的法定货币。
description.en: Since its establishment, the People's Bank of China has been issuing the Renminbi as the national legal tender.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 1983年9月，国务院决定成立中国工商银行，以承办原由中国人民银行承担的工商信贷和储蓄业务。
description.en: In September 1983, the State Council decided to establish the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China to take over the industrial and commercial credit and savings business previously handled by the People's Bank of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国务院决定中国人民银行专门行使国家中央银行职能，不再承担工商信贷和储蓄业务，该部分业务由新成立的中国工商银行承办。
description.en: The State Council decided that the People's Bank of China would exclusively exercise the functions of a national central bank and no longer undertake industrial and commercial credit and savings business, which was transferred to the newly established Industrial and Commercial Bank of China.

relationships.source: 第八届全国人民代表大会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国中国人民银行法

description.zh-cn: 1995年3月18日，第八届全国人民代表大会第三次会议通过了《中华人民共和国中国人民银行法》。
description.en: On March 18, 1995, the Third Session of the 8th National People's Congress passed the 'Law of the People's Republic of China on the People's Bank of China'.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中国人民银行法

description.zh-cn: 该法以国家立法形式确定了中国人民银行是中华人民共和国的中央银行。
description.en: This law established the People's Bank of China as the central bank of the People's Republic of China through national legislation.

description.zh-cn: 1947年10月，中共中央根据董必武的提议，决定筹备建立中国人民银行。
description.en: In October 1947, the Central Committee of the CCP, based on a proposal by Dong Biwu, decided to prepare for the establishment of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，中国人民银行于1970年6月与财政部合并，后于1978年3月恢复分设。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the People's Bank of China was merged with the Ministry of Finance in June 1970 and was re-established as a separate entity in March 1978.

relationships.target: 中国银行业监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 2003年，中国人民银行对银行、金融资产管理公司、信托投资公司及其他存款类金融机构的监管职能被分离出来，并整合成立了中国银行业监督管理委员会。
description.en: In 2003, the regulatory functions of the People's Bank of China over banks, financial asset management companies, trust and investment corporations, and other deposit-taking financial institutions were spun off and integrated to form the China Banking Regulatory Commission.

relationships.source: 第十四届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2023年3月，第十四届全国人民代表大会第一次会议审议批准了《国务院机构改革方案》。
description.en: In March 2023, the First Session of the 14th National People's Congress reviewed and approved the 'State Council Institutional Reform Plan'.

description.zh-cn: 该方案规定将中国人民银行对金融控股公司等金融集团的日常监管职责、有关金融消费者保护职责划入新成立的国家金融监督管理总局。
description.en: The plan stipulated the transfer of the People's Bank of China's daily regulatory responsibilities for financial holding companies and other financial groups, as well as relevant financial consumer protection duties, to the newly established National Administration of Financial Regulation.

relationships.source: 党和国家机构改革方案
relationships.target: 国务院金融稳定发展委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据2023年《党和国家机构改革方案》，不再保留国务院金融稳定发展委员会及其办事机构。
description.en: According to the 2023 'Party and State Institutional Reform Plan', the State Council's Financial Stability and Development Committee and its office were dissolved.

relationships.source: 党和国家机构改革方案
relationships.target: 中央金融委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 根据2023年《党和国家机构改革方案》，将原国务院金融稳定发展委员会办公室职责划入中央金融委员会办公室。
description.en: According to the 2023 'Party and State Institutional Reform Plan', the responsibilities of the former Office of the State Council's Financial Stability and Development Committee were transferred to the Office of the Central Financial Commission.

position.en: Head of the Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group
